entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Local smoke this evening. Fog patches overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23.
